DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate short term effect triticale , mung bean adzuki bean intervention health improvement patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Triticale , Mung Bean Adzuki Bean Intervention Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The study evaluate effect triticale , mung bean adzuki bean metabolic nutritional status patient type 2 diabetes 30 day intervention . Patients assign control intervention group ( A diet include triticale mung bean ; B diet include adzuki bean ) . Blood urine sample collect baseline 30 day intervention .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female patient age 30 65 year 2. patient diagnose type 2 diabetes mellitus 3 . Patients like follow 2 month . 1 . Women pregnancy lactation . 2 . Individuals history severe kidney disease , cardiovascular disease , stroke , cancer , psychological disorder .
